content.rendered:
This page Throw little light on what Naijablog is all about.

Naijablog.ng is an online publishing platform of present and past things that happening in Nigeria, Africa and the world.

Naijablog.ng was found in 2017, it was earlier known as Omokoshaban, with Url Omokoshaban.com.

The blog was renamed in 2021 after many of our readers complain that they find it difficult to pronounce Omokoshaban.

After several through, we unanimously agree to change the name to Naijablog, with Naijablog.ng as the url.

Also, to give room for everyone irrespective of ethnicity, religious, and region to be able to published lastest happening within it environment without contacting any editor, publishers or paying for it.

In Naijablog we have it open for everyone to create account and published his or her contents directly from the website, also the published will monitor how his or her post is doing right from the website.

Feature

Naijablog will in feature provide means where everyone will be making revenues from his or her contents published on the website.

More updates will be Added
